page.title: 06BROOKVILLE...
page.content: Brookville is two kilometres from Methwold.It is a bit too far for the young children to walk to school,so they travel by bus or car.Out of 126 children at Methwold Primary school 21 live in Brookville.The main road from Methwold to Stoke Ferry runs though Brookville and there are four lanes leading off it.The lanes are called "The Avenue","Scotts Lane", "Brook Lane" and "Holders Lane". The only shop in Brookville is a small post office and general store,but there is also a transport cafe.There is a Market Garden in Brookville,growing mainly tomatoes,cucumbers,lettuces and peppers,and they supply many of the local shops.Most of the inhabitants of Brookville are either self-employed or work in Methwold.
